sqlMap.select: select STAFF_ID, STANDBY1, ENTER_TIME, REGION_ID, LEAVE_TIME, STAY_LONG, COMPANY_ID, STANDBY2, REMARK, STANDBY3 from WQ_REGION_VISIT where STAFF_ID = #staffId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.delete: delete from WQ_REGION_VISIT where STAFF_ID = #staffId:VARCHAR# and REGION_ID = #regionId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into WQ_REGION_VISIT (STAFF_ID, STANDBY1, ENTER_TIME, REGION_ID, LEAVE_TIME, STAY_LONG, COMPANY_ID, STANDBY2, REMARK, STANDBY3) values (#staffId:VARCHAR#, #standby1:VARCHAR#, #enterTime:VARCHAR#, #regionId:VARCHAR#, #leaveTime:VARCHAR#, #stayLong:DECIMAL#, #companyId:VARCHAR#, #standby2:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #standby3:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update WQ_REGION_VISIT set STANDBY1 = #standby1:VARCHAR#, ENTER_TIME = #enterTime:VARCHAR#, REGION_ID = #regionId:VARCHAR#, LEAVE_TIME = #leaveTime:VARCHAR#, STAY_LONG = #stayLong:DECIMAL#, COMPANY_ID = #companyId:VARCHAR#, STANDBY2 = #standby2:VARCHAR#, REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#, STANDBY3 = #standby3:VARCHAR# where STAFF_ID = #staffId:VARCHAR#
